data.title: TheRWBYFamilton
data.meta_description: Read stories about #character, #forbiddenlove, and #blake on Wattpad, recommended by TheRWBYFamilton
data.text:
Peerless Gleam ( Willow Schnee x Male Reader)

(y/n) Branwen was one of, if not the strongest member of the Branwen Tribe back in the day, along with his siblings, Qrow and Raven. Sent to Beacon to learn how to lead the tribe, he should have been happy, as one of the most promising Huntsman of his time. And yet why wasn't he? For reasons (y/n) could never explain...

Weiss X Male Reader: Hidden Love

You and Weiss Schnee love each other with all your hearts. Problem is, no one is suppose to know about it. Clarification: This is probably, the worse thing I have written. Disclaimer: I do not own RWBY. All characters from RWBY are own by Rooster Teeth. All RWBY OCs within this story are owned by me.

Completed

The Mimic - A Blake X Male Reader story

Y/N is a member of the White Fang, Vale branch. He was the Right hand of Adam Taurus, but that was before he was left on Death's doorstep after a train robbery gone bad... Only to be saved by a certain Cat Faunus... Now Blake and Y/N have decided to try and undo all of their wrongs by becoming a Huntsmen/Huntress, and...

Mature

One Guy, Four Girls: Summer, Raven, Willow, and Kali x Male Reader

Me and a friend of mine were talking and as we did, he asked me something and it was related to this story and I decided to work on this story and I'm super excited to work on this. So, in this story you (the reader) is a strong huntsman where it gets attention from everyone on Remnant, but then one day you hear a com...

Completed Mature

abused and neglected male hit Oc x rwby

he is getting sick and tired of the people who adopted him that were suppose to love him assault him and force him to do everything himself while the all trained and ate and slept until one day a mysterious man figured that he should train this kid and give him a better life than what he was getting.

Completed Mature

Coco Adel x Male Reader

Well, it turns out the voting pole results have shown that Coco has won the vote and so, here is my Coco x male reader story. And this story will not have the childhood friend aspect as my other four stories and this is like my Pyrrha story where they meet up. Disclaimer: "I do not own RWBY, they belong to Roosterteet...

Completed Mature

Blake Belladonna x Male Reader x Velvet Scarlatina

This was a story that I've been dying to work on and there's more of these, but mostly they're one-shots, so for you readers here is both these two in a single story and I hope you will enjoy it and this is my first reader story with two characters. Disclaimer: I do not own RWBY, they belong to Roosterteeth.

Completed Mature

RWBY (Ruby Rose X Reader) 18+

Your Parents are the wielders of the ancient power of the maidens in a desperate act to escape from Salem they sent you to your mom's sisters place hiding your existence from everyone except a select trusted few once your parents died ( cause of death: Salem) their powers got transferred to you unknown to you. At one...

Mature

Grimm Adventures

You're accepted into Beacon a few weeks late. But you harbor a dark secret, and RWBY is constantly haunting your dreams. Will you be able to find peace? Or will you give in to your past? Only time will tell.

Loving Blake

I haven't done a non Harem yet, so I figured I'd give it a shot. Similar to my other story, you'll be an Ex White Fang general and a Grimm shifter, similar to Alex Mercer from the Prototype series. Win Blake's love in any way possible.

Mature

Tales Of The Grimm

The time is near. Here you will discover how I always wanted my Grimm character to be. The other stories were just playful fun. But this... this will be the birth of a true Legend. He will awaken. The true nature of the character all my readers love so dearly. Here, his legend will be known. All shall kneel before thi...

Barbara Dunkelman x reader Reboot

(y/n) (l/n) was in love with someone his entire life, the amazing Barbara Dunkelman. The two of them were great friends, but he lost her to someone else. He rushes into another relationship, not wanting to be alone. So what happens when that relationship becomes abusive

Depressing RWBY One Shots

We were discussing RWBY one night when Nicole came up with a bunch of depressing and weird alternate endings for RWBY characters. Here are the best one-shots we have.

Completed

When The Mind Breaks (A RWBY story)

'He couldn't stand it anymore, no matter how hard he tried, no matter how good things seemed, it just kept getting worse and worse. All he wanted was happiness and for everything to be just fine. But no, nothing is ever that simple, and his mind couldn't handle that anymore.' Note: Not everyone will act like they do...

God of destruction male reader x Rwby (Dragon ball super x Rwby)/Discontinued

After asking a stupid question team Rwby have to find the answer to why the moon is shattered. While doing some research they find something unexpected. something that will change how team Rwby sees true power.

Male Reader OP Saiyan X RWBY Harem X DBS Harem

(Y/N) (L/N) is a seventeen-year-old boy who has gone through different abuses by his family and also by his schoolmates but once he meets Ozpin and lets him join Beacon, he'll meet the people who will make him forget his past.... Disclaimer: I do not own RWBY RWBY Is owned by Rooster Teeth

Completed

Velvet Scarlatina is not my character. All videos and pictures are owned by their respective owners and Velvet Scarlatina is owned by Roo...

Mature

The princess and the fighter ( Weiss Schnee x Male Reader)

When Weiss thinks of her childhood, she remembers it being lonely. And that isn't a lie. But, for most of her life, she did have one friend. (y/n). Due to circumstances, he wasn't able to see her for years. Until the both of them end up going to Beacon together.

Rise of the Werewolf: RWBY Harem x Male Faunus reader

This is a story I thought of and when it popped in my head, I decided one day that I will work on this. In this one, you (The reader) are the first Werewolf Faunus and you will look human, but you have an ability to hide your Faunus looks, but doesn't know yet. You have two semblances is called Wolf's Rage and Wolf's...

Completed Mature
